dialog.speaker: John
dialog.english: Hello, my name is John. What's your name?
dialog.indonesian: Halo, nama saya John. Siapa nama Anda?

dialog.speaker: Lisa
dialog.english: Hi John, I'm Lisa. Nice to meet you.
dialog.indonesian: Hai John, saya Lisa. Senang bertemu denganmu.

dialog.speaker: John
dialog.english: Nice to meet you too, Lisa. Where are you from?
dialog.indonesian: Senang bertemu denganmu juga, Lisa. Kamu dari mana?

dialog.speaker: Lisa
dialog.english: I'm from Jakarta, Indonesia. How about you?
dialog.indonesian: Saya dari Jakarta, Indonesia. Bagaimana denganmu?

dialog.speaker: John
dialog.english: I'm from London, England. Are you here for vacation?
dialog.indonesian: Saya dari London, Inggris. Apakah kamu di sini untuk berlibur?

dialog.speaker: Customer
dialog.english: Excuse me, how much is this shirt?
dialog.indonesian: Permisi, berapa harga kemeja ini?

dialog.speaker: Shopkeeper
dialog.english: It's $25. Would you like to try it on?
dialog.indonesian: Harganya $25. Apakah Anda ingin mencobanya?

dialog.speaker: Customer
dialog.english: Yes, please. Where is the fitting room?
dialog.indonesian: Ya, tolong. Di mana ruang ganti?

dialog.speaker: Shopkeeper
dialog.english: It's over there, on your right.
dialog.indonesian: Ada di sebelah sana, di sebelah kanan Anda.

dialog.speaker: Customer
dialog.english: Thank you. I'll take this one.
dialog.indonesian: Terima kasih. Saya akan mengambil yang ini.

title: Memesan Makanan
description: Percakapan di restoran saat memesan makanan

dialog.speaker: Waiter
dialog.english: Good evening. Are you ready to order?
dialog.indonesian: Selamat malam. Apakah Anda siap memesan?

dialog.speaker: Customer
dialog.english: Yes, I'd like the grilled salmon with vegetables, please.
dialog.indonesian: Ya, saya ingin salmon panggang dengan sayuran.

dialog.speaker: Waiter
dialog.english: How would you like your salmon cooked?
dialog.indonesian: Bagaimana tingkat kematangan salmon yang Anda inginkan?

dialog.speaker: Customer
dialog.english: Medium, please. And could I get a glass of red wine?
dialog.indonesian: Medium saja. Dan bisakah saya dapatkan segelas anggur merah?

title: Bertanya Arah
description: Percakapan saat bertanya arah di jalan

dialog.speaker: Tourist
dialog.english: Excuse me, could you tell me how to get to the museum?
dialog.indonesian: Permisi, bisakah Anda memberi tahu saya bagaimana cara ke museum?

dialog.speaker: Local
dialog.english: Sure, it's about two blocks from here. Go straight and turn left at the traffic light.
dialog.indonesian: Tentu, sekitar dua blok dari sini. Jalan lurus dan belok kiri di lampu lalu lintas.

dialog.speaker: Tourist
dialog.english: Is it within walking distance?
dialog.indonesian: Apakah bisa dicapai dengan berjalan kaki?

dialog.speaker: Local
dialog.english: Yes, it's about a 10-minute walk. You can't miss it - it's a big white building.
dialog.indonesian: Ya, sekitar 10 menit berjalan kaki. Anda tidak akan melewatkannya - itu gedung putih yang besar.

title: Memesan Taksi
description: Percakapan saat memesan taksi melalui telepon

dialog.speaker: Caller
dialog.english: Hello, I'd like to book a taxi, please.
dialog.indonesian: Halo, saya ingin memesan taksi.

dialog.speaker: Operator
dialog.english: Certainly. What's your pickup address?
dialog.indonesian: Tentu. Apa alamat penjemputan Anda?

dialog.speaker: Caller
dialog.english: 123 Main Street, in front of the post office.
dialog.indonesian: 123 Jalan Utama, di depan kantor pos.

dialog.speaker: Operator
dialog.english: And your destination?
dialog.indonesian: Dan tujuan Anda?

dialog.speaker: Caller
dialog.english: Central Station, please. How long will the taxi take?
dialog.indonesian: Stasiun Pusat. Berapa lama taksi akan tiba?
